name: CST
description:
Circle Square Triangle is an infinite hypnotic reflex game, with music. 
Play it full screen if you want to fully enjoy it  .
The game speed increases when you win and decreases when you lose. You are the only difficulty factor. 
It's still in a developement phase. 
Smartphone/multitouch supported.

Future features: 

  • - Online leaderboard
  • - combo system
  • - More songs
  • - Visuals improvement
  • - not really provided other improvements
